text: Need Andrew Clark for Zambrero campaign. Budget around $18,098, looking for 2 x 15-second TikTok, 1 x Social media takeover, 1 x Twitter post, 1 x Facebook post. 10 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs October 2025. Usage rights for 12 months. Engagement period: 5 months. Additional notes: TBC on exact dates, around $18,098 budget
